00033         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER GLM_CONSTEXPR length_t tmat3x4<T, P>::length() const
00034         {
00035                 return 3;

00044         (

00066         template <typename T, precision P>
00067         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P>::tmat3x4()
00068         {
00069                 this->value[0] = col_type(1, 0, 0, 0);
00070                 this->value[1] = col_type(0, 1, 0, 0);
00071                 this->value[2] = col_type(0, 0, 1, 0);
00072         }
00073 
00074         template <typename T, precision P>
00075         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P>::tmat3x4
00076         (
00077                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m
00078         )
00079         {
00080                 this->value[0] = m.value[0];
00081                 this->value[1] = m.value[1];
00082                 this->value[2] = m.value[2];
00083         }

00089         {

00102         template <typename T, precision P>
00103         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P>::tmat3x4
00104         (
00105                 T const & s
00106         )
00107         {
00108                 value_type const Zero(0);
00109                 this->value[0] = col_type(s, Zero, Zero, Zero);
00110                 this->value[1] = col_type(Zero, s, Zero, Zero);
00111                 this->value[2] = col_type(Zero, Zero, s, Zero);
00112         }
00113 
00114         template <typename T, precision P>
00115         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P>::tmat3x4
00116         (
00117                 T const & x0, T const & y0, T const & z0, T const & w0,
00118                 T const & x1, T const & y1, T const & z1, T const & w1,
00119                 T const & x2, T const & y2, T const & z2, T const & w2
00120         )
00121         {
00122                 this->value[0] = col_type(x0, y0, z0, w0);
00123                 this->value[1] = col_type(x1, y1, z1, w1);
00124                 this->value[2] = col_type(x2, y2, z2, w2);
00125         }
00126 
00127         template <typename T, precision P>
00128         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P>::tmat3x4
00129         (
00130                 col_type const & v0,
00131                 col_type const & v1,
00132                 col_type const & v2
00133         )
00134         {
00135                 this->value[0] = v0;
00136                 this->value[1] = v1;
00137                 this->value[2] = v2;
00138         }

00141         // Conversion constructors
00142         template <typename T, precision P>
00143         template <
00144                 typename X1, typename Y1, typename Z1, typename W1,
00145                 typename X2, typename Y2, typename Z2, typename W2,
00146                 typename X3, typename Y3, typename Z3, typename W3>
00147         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P>::tmat3x4
00148         (
00149                 X1 const & x1, Y1 const & y1, Z1 const & z1, W1 const & w1,
00150                 X2 const & x2, Y2 const & y2, Z2 const & z2, W2 const & w2,
00151                 X3 const & x3, Y3 const & y3, Z3 const & z3, W3 const & w3
00152         )
00153         {
00154                 this->value[0] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x1), value_type(y1), value_type(z1), value_type(w1));
00155                 this->value[1] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x2), value_type(y2), value_type(z2), value_type(w2));
00156                 this->value[2] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x3), value_type(y3), value_type(z3), value_type(w3));
00157         }
00158         
00159         template <typename T, precision P>
00160         template <typename V1, typename V2, typename V3>
00161         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P>::tmat3x4
00162         (
00163                 tvec4<V1, P> const & v1,
00164                 tvec4<V2, P> const & v2,
00165                 tvec4<V3, P> const & v3
00166         )
00167         {
00168                 this->value[0] = col_type(v1);
00169                 this->value[1] = col_type(v2);
00170                 this->value[2] = col_type(v3);
00171         }

00176         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P>::tmat3x4

00179         )

00181                 this->value[0] = col_type(m[0]);

00184         }

00186         template <typename T, precision P>
00187         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P>::tmat3x4
00188         (
00189                 tmat2x2<T, P> const & m
00190         )
00191         {
00192                 this->value[0] = col_type(m[0], detail::tvec2<T, P>(0));
00193                 this->value[1] = col_type(m[1], detail::tvec2<T, P>(0));
00194                 this->value[2] = col_type(T(0), T(0), T(1), T(0));
00195         }

00253         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P>::tmat3x4
00254         (
00255                 tmat4x2<T, P> const & m
00256         )
00257         {

00259                 this->value[1] = col_type(m[1], detail::tvec2<T, P>(T(0)));

00393         template <typename T, precision P>
00394         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P> operator+
00395         (
00396                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m, 
00397                 T const & s
00398         )
00399         {
00400                 return tmat3x4<T, P>(
00401                         m[0] + s,
00402                         m[1] + s,
00403                         m[2] + s);
00404         }

00406         template <typename T, precision P>
00407         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P> operator+

00410                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m2
00411         )

00415                         m1[1] + m2[1],

00471         template <typename T, precision P>
00472         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat3x4<T, P>::col_type operator*
00473         (
00474                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m,
00475                 typename tmat3x4<T, P>::row_type const & v
00476         )
00477         {
00478                 return typename tmat3x4<T, P>::col_type(
00479                         m[0][0] * v.x + m[1][0] * v.y + m[2][0] * v.z,
00480                         m[0][1] * v.x + m[1][1] * v.y + m[2][1] * v.z,
00481                         m[0][2] * v.x + m[1][2] * v.y + m[2][2] * v.z,
00482                         m[0][3] * v.x + m[1][3] * v.y + m[2][3] * v.z);
00483         }
00484 
00485         template <typename T, precision P>
00486         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat3x4<T, P>::row_type operator*
00487         (
00488                 typename tmat3x4<T, P>::col_type const & v,
00489                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m
00490         )
00491         {
00492                 return typename tmat3x4<T, P>::row_type(
00493                         v.x * m[0][0] + v.y * m[0][1] + v.z * m[0][2] + v.w * m[0][3],
00494                         v.x * m[1][0] + v.y * m[1][1] + v.z * m[1][2] + v.w * m[1][3],
00495                         v.x * m[2][0] + v.y * m[2][1] + v.z * m[2][2] + v.w * m[2][3]);
00496         }
00497 
00498         template <typename T, precision P>
00499         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x4<T, P> operator*
00500         (
00501                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m1,
00502                 tmat4x3<T, P> const & m2
00503         )
00504         {
00505                 const T SrcA00 = m1[0][0];
00506                 const T SrcA01 = m1[0][1];
00507                 const T SrcA02 = m1[0][2];
00508                 const T SrcA03 = m1[0][3];
00509                 const T SrcA10 = m1[1][0];
00510                 const T SrcA11 = m1[1][1];
00511                 const T SrcA12 = m1[1][2];
00512                 const T SrcA13 = m1[1][3];
00513                 const T SrcA20 = m1[2][0];
00514                 const T SrcA21 = m1[2][1];
00515                 const T SrcA22 = m1[2][2];
00516                 const T SrcA23 = m1[2][3];
00517 
00518                 const T SrcB00 = m2[0][0];
00519                 const T SrcB01 = m2[0][1];
00520                 const T SrcB02 = m2[0][2];
00521                 const T SrcB10 = m2[1][0];
00522                 const T SrcB11 = m2[1][1];
00523                 const T SrcB12 = m2[1][2];
00524                 const T SrcB20 = m2[2][0];
00525                 const T SrcB21 = m2[2][1];
00526                 const T SrcB22 = m2[2][2];
00527                 const T SrcB30 = m2[3][0];
00528                 const T SrcB31 = m2[3][1];
00529                 const T SrcB32 = m2[3][2];
00530 
00531                 tmat4x4<T, P> Result(tmat4x4<T, P>::_null);
00532                 Result[0][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB00 + SrcA10 * SrcB01 + SrcA20 * SrcB02;
00533                 Result[0][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB00 + SrcA11 * SrcB01 + SrcA21 * SrcB02;
00534                 Result[0][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB00 + SrcA12 * SrcB01 + SrcA22 * SrcB02;
00535                 Result[0][3] = SrcA03 * SrcB00 + SrcA13 * SrcB01 + SrcA23 * SrcB02;
00536                 Result[1][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB10 + SrcA10 * SrcB11 + SrcA20 * SrcB12;
00537                 Result[1][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB10 + SrcA11 * SrcB11 + SrcA21 * SrcB12;
00538                 Result[1][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB10 + SrcA12 * SrcB11 + SrcA22 * SrcB12;
00539                 Result[1][3] = SrcA03 * SrcB10 + SrcA13 * SrcB11 + SrcA23 * SrcB12;
00540                 Result[2][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB20 + SrcA10 * SrcB21 + SrcA20 * SrcB22;
00541                 Result[2][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB20 + SrcA11 * SrcB21 + SrcA21 * SrcB22;
00542                 Result[2][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB20 + SrcA12 * SrcB21 + SrcA22 * SrcB22;
00543                 Result[2][3] = SrcA03 * SrcB20 + SrcA13 * SrcB21 + SrcA23 * SrcB22;
00544                 Result[3][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB30 + SrcA10 * SrcB31 + SrcA20 * SrcB32;
00545                 Result[3][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB30 + SrcA11 * SrcB31 + SrcA21 * SrcB32;
00546                 Result[3][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB30 + SrcA12 * SrcB31 + SrcA22 * SrcB32;
00547                 Result[3][3] = SrcA03 * SrcB30 + SrcA13 * SrcB31 + SrcA23 * SrcB32;
00548                 return Result;
00549         }
00550 
00551         template <typename T, precision P>
00552         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x4<T, P> operator*
00553         (
00554                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m1,
00555                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m2
00556         )
00557         {
00558                 return tmat2x4<T, P>(
00559                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[0][2],
00560                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[0][2],
00561                         m1[0][2] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[0][2],
00562                         m1[0][3] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][3] * m2[0][2],
00563                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[1][2],
00564                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[1][2],
00565                         m1[0][2] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[1][2],
00566                         m1[0][3] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][3] * m2[1][2]);
00567         }
00568 
00569         template <typename T, precision P>
00570         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P> operator*
00571         (
00572                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m1,
00573                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m2
00574         )
00575         {
00576                 return tmat3x4<T, P>(
00577                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[0][2],
00578                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[0][2],
00579                         m1[0][2] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[0][2],
00580                         m1[0][3] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][3] * m2[0][2],
00581                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[1][2],
00582                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[1][2],
00583                         m1[0][2] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[1][2],
00584                         m1[0][3] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][3] * m2[1][2],
00585                         m1[0][0] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[2][2],
00586                         m1[0][1] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[2][2],
00587                         m1[0][2] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[2][2],
00588                         m1[0][3] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][3] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][3] * m2[2][2]);
00589         }
00590 
00591         template <typename T, precision P>
00592         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P> operator/
00593         (
00594                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m,
00595                 T const & s
00596         )
00597         {
00598                 return tmat3x4<T, P>(
00599                         m[0] / s,
00600                         m[1] / s,
00601                         m[2] / s);
00602         }
00603 
00604         template <typename T, precision P>
00605         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P> operator/
00606         (
00607                 T const & s,
00608                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m
00609         )
00610         {
00611                 return tmat3x4<T, P>(
00612                         s / m[0],
00613                         s / m[1],
00614                         s / m[2]);
00615         }

00617         // Unary constant operators
00618         template <typename T, precision P>
00619         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x4<T, P> const operator-
00620         (
00621                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m
00622         )
00623         {
00624                 return tmat3x4<T, P>(
00625                         -m[0],
00626                         -m[1],
00627                         -m[2]);
00628         }

00631         // Boolean operators
00632 
00633         template <typename T, precision P>
00634         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator==
00635         (
00636                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m1,
00637                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m2
00638         )
00639         {
00640                 return (m1[0] == m2[0]) && (m1[1] == m2[1]) && (m1[2] == m2[2]);
00641         }
00642 
00643         template <typename T, precision P>
00644         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator!=
00645         (
00646                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m1,
00647                 tmat3x4<T, P> const & m2
00648         )
00649         {
00650                 return (m1[0] != m2[0]) || (m1[1] != m2[1]) || (m1[2] != m2[2]);
00651         }
